analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x591a95ef45aecc4cf649e779ddb970d1454f0c2a.sol#220-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x591a95ef45aecc4cf649e779ddb970d1454f0c2a.sol#221-222)

DagtCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/17/0x591a95ef45aecc4cf649e779ddb970d1454f0c2a.sol#712-724) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).mint(remainingTokensWallet,MAX_TOKENS.sub(totalSupply)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x591a95ef45aecc4cf649e779ddb970d1454f0c2a.sol#720)
